Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Unlike teachers, GenAI often makes numerous mistakes in correcting or critiquing work and doesn't give feedback that's helpful unless properly prompted to. Whereas GenAI often provides as much feedback as the user likes/needs.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really many differences in this point.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Often teachers provide more vague feedback and will provide more but it requires time and effort on the part of both individuals. Whereas GenAI provides as much as you prompt it to.
